summary: Client requested Jordan to run a test; QA reported the test passed with output matching the expected string. No comments were received from PM, Architect, or Developer during this update.

decisions.title: Test result accepted
decisions.details: QA confirmed the test output matches the expected value ('hi dude'); proceed to close the test task or advance the workflow.

sign_offs.what: Approved test result â€” output matches expected: 'hi dude'

actions.task: Notify the client and Jordan that QA confirmed the test passed and close or transition the test task accordingly

backlog_deltas.title: Mark test as passed and move task to Done

risks.risk: PM/Architect/Developer provided no comments; lack of confirmations from these roles may delay subsequent work or leave issues unaddressed.
risks.mitigation: PM to follow up with Architect and Developer for explicit confirmations or assign follow-up tasks if further work is required.
